Evolution of Usage Over Time, from Administrative Data Notes: Plots show evolution of total deposited and total withdrawn to date over time, as well as their difference. The y-axis are in local currencies as the exchange rate changed over the study period in Malawi hence making comparisons over time in USD somewhat difficult. The 50 USD text boxes at placed to show the exchange rate at the beginning and end of the study period.
